description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan
precise time at which each data sample was recorded in ms
length of time that a participants gaze remains focused on a specific point or area of interest (in ms)
unique identifier (ID) assigned to each area of interest (AOI)
name assigned by researcher to a specific area of interest
indicates whether a fixation is valid (true or false- according to the defined criteria)/ suggests that the gaze data is reliable
refined fixmark after additional processing to enhance accuracy (true or false)
horizontal coordinate (X-axis) of the fixation point
vertical coordinate Y-axis) of the fixation point
